description: Students expand their ability to communicate in French, understand French texts and interpret French and U.S. cultures through study and discussion of specific social and cultural topics that are relevant (eg. stereotypes, the family, education, immigration). Explicit focus oncross-cultural comparison/contrast and analysis. Students develop their ability to listen, speak, read and write, while paying particular attention to listening and reading strategies. Prerequisite: French 112 or placement.
name: Intermed French I
notes: Open to first-year students who meet the prerequisites
title: Intermediate French I
